summary: I RECEIVED A SAFETY RECALL LETTER FROM BMW IN REGARDS TO RECALL CAMPAIGN NO. 16V-071 - DRIVER'S FRONT AIR BAG BACK IN MARCH 2016.  IT IS NOW THE MIDDLE OF JUNE 2017 AND THE BMW DEALERSHIP STILL CLAIMS NO PARTS ON HAND AND NO IDEA WHEN THEY WILL BE RECEIVING THEM.  THIS RECALL IS TAKING WAY TOO LONG TO COMPLETE.  I HAVE ATTEMPTED TO SALE AND TRADE THE CAR IN BUT NO ONE WANTS IT DUE TO THE RECALL.
